entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
